## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r loading_and_preprocessing_the_data, echo = TRUE}
InstallAndLoadRequiredPackages <- function() {
  # Load the required packages.
  if (!require('pacman')) {
    install.packages('pacman')
  }
  pacman::p_load(data.table, dtplyr, tidyverse)
}

InstallAndLoadRequiredPackages()

activity.monitoring.data <- read_csv('activity.zip') %>%
  mutate(interval = as.factor(interval))
```


## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r mean_total_steps_per_day, echo = TRUE}
activity.monitoring.data %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarise(mean.steps = mean(steps, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(date, mean.steps)) + geom_bar(stat = 'identity')
```

## What is median total number of steps taken per day?
```{r median_total_steps_per_day, echo = TRUE}
activity.monitoring.data %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarise(median.steps = median(steps, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(date, median.steps)) + geom_bar(stat = 'identity')
```


## What is the average daily activity pattern?
```{r median_total_steps_per_day, echo = TRUE}
activity.monitoring.data %>%
  group_by(interval) %>%
  summarise(mean.steps = mean(steps, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(interval, mean.steps)) + geom_point()
```
